detectors.description: DBACoin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#31-134) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:DBACoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#95-98)

	- require(bool)(now > unfreezeDate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#78)

detectors.description:

detectors.description:
transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#18-22)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#76-83)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#25)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#72-74)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#26)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#85-93)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#95-98)

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#101-111)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#113-115)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#117-123)

updateFreezeTime(uint256) should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.updateFreezeTime(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#125-128)

getReleaseTime() should be declared external:
	- DBACoin.getReleaseTime() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBACoin.sol#130-132)
